solution_line_template: The number of inhabitants of Salem is {salem_multiplier} * {leesburg_population} = <<{salem_multiplier}*{leesburg_population}={salem_initial_population}>>{salem_initial_population} inhabitants.

But some have moved, so there are {salem_initial_population} - {people_moved_out} = <<{salem_initial_population}-{people_moved_out}={salem_current_population}>>{salem_current_population} inhabitants left
